content: the worst World Hoax ever. Since the creation of the 4 billion planet Earth the climate has warmed and cooled countless time Humans have only been around for 200k years that's .005 % of our history. We’ve only produced any CO2 for 500 years. Historically CO2 was always higher
"At the end of the day..." "The fact of the matter is..." "Love the sinner; hate the sin." "The Earth has ALWAYS warmed and cooled!" "It is what it is!" "Work smarter, not harder!"  STAHP IT!!!

Disingenuous statements: "Hate the sin; love the sinner." "The Earth has always warmed and cooled!" "Let's just agree to disagree." "This is a Christian nation!" "The planet is 6,000 years old! The Bible proves it!" "Faith > facts."

Can a planet experience natural global warming without human interference? The earth has warmed and cooled many times before humans existed. But the changes have almost always been very slow, and the exceptions of rapid change have greatly reduced the viability of the earth.

The much ignored (b/c it doesn't fit the Left's narrative) #MilankovitchTheory explains much of our #ClimateChange.  That & el nino most likely explain the current warmer temps, nothing different than in ancient times; earth has ALWAYS warmed & cooled.  climate.nasa.gov/news/2948/m…

Anyone that believes climate change is man-made has ZERO idea what they’re talking about. In the history of the earth, climate has always warmed and cooled. We’re just on a spec in time… How high have sea levels risen since they sounded the alarm in the 1990’s? ZERO.

The earth has warmed and cooled since the day it was created. The ice there is left over from the last ice age, it was always going to melt, we’ve just accelerated that. If humans were alive when Pangea broke up he’d prob blame us for that too
